properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 2:52PM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow occurring.
Additional snow accumulations of up to 8 inches, except up to
one inch at lower elevations. For the Winter Storm Warning,
heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches,
except 2 to 4 inches at lower elevations.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Sunday. For
the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 AM Sunday to 5 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could
cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Increased avalanche danger is possible for
those in the backcountry and on steep terrain.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 5 PM MST MONDAY
